intro: One band's music becomes a thrilling action-adventure game!
description:
Tyraels Ascension: Hell Walker - The Video Game, is a tight action adventure game with lite RPG elements that focuses on boss fights, exploring for upgrades, replayable levels, key collection, and many hidden secrets.
Based on the music of the metalcore band “Tyraels Ascension,” and created by the band themselves, the game is prequel to the story laid out in the bands album "Hell Walker."
Enjoy the chip-tune versions of songs from the album transformed into "chip-tune" versions and fight your through with an angelic fury.

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switch™.
